name: AGRICULTURAL NUTRIENT POLICY COUNCIL
description: Works with federal agencies on policies and programs involving nutrients and water quality
sampleDescriptions: Clean Water Act policies and regulations involving or affecting agricultural water quality issues.  Matters may involve water quality standards, TMDLs, waters of the US, and related CWA matters.
Clean Water Act policies and regulations involving or affecting agricultural water quality issues.  Matters may involve water quality standards, TMDLs, waters of the US, and related CWA matters.
Policy and regulatory matters involving Clean Water Act implementation, including review and approval of state water quality standards, as well as Waters of the US.
